comments:
Build ID:  I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create C++ Project and Add a remote directory usinf RSE
a. Create a C++ Project
b. From Menu:New Folder->Advanced->Link to Folder in Filesystem->Select RSE->Select some remote path->Finish

2. Project->Properties->C/C++ General->Paths and Symbols->Add the recently added remote folder to include Paths.
3.Click Apply. It will throw a NullPointerException
